text: Events from the year 1583 in India. ==Events== * July 25 – Cuncolim Revolt * Muzaffar Shah III escapes from prison and briefly re-establishes the Muzaffarid dynasty of Gujarat before Akbar established the Mughal dynasty *Building of the fort of Allahabad by Emperor Akbar.Everyman's Dictionary of Dates; 6th ed. J. M. Dent, 1971; p. 32 ==Births== ==Deaths== * Rodolfo Acquaviva, Jesuit missionary at the court of Akbar dies (born 1550) ==See also== * Timeline of Indian history ==References==
title: 1583 in India
